entry.title: Enable product search by SKU in free version of Ivory Search plugin
entry.content:
If you use this plugin: https://wordpress.org/plugins/add-search-to-menu/ and want to activate the product search feature by SKU without having to use the premium one, then you can use the file I attached https://drive.google.com/file/d/1Hudj0XNFLkmuJVgSPpiUDG5ioefGmUXU/view?usp=sharing.

Extract the file and copy it to the root folder of the theme you are using.

Good luck.

entry.title: WOOF - WooCommerce Products Filter - Fixing Price Filter
entry.content:
woocommerce-products-filter/index.php

Delete the line of code inside

and replace it with the one above.

woocommerce-products-filter/classes/helper.php

Replace the code line 441-443 with the one above.


Hope that fixes the problem with the price filter.

entry.title: Remove all orders Woocommerce using Query SQL
Sort WooCommerce Products by SKU
How to Add Image Preview to File Upload Field for GravityForm ( New Updated 2022 )
entry.content: I updated the tutorial featuring preview image upload for GravityForm from this link https://websitedepot.com/gravityforms-how-to-add-image-preview-to-file-upload-field/. For recent versions of gravityform use the function with variable update. So I just added the latest javascript function to be able to display those thumbnails.

entry.title: Backup WordPress using WP-CLI
entry.content:
wp db export

zip -r my_export_file_name.zip *

rm (name of sql file you exported)

entry.title: Woocommerce Remove Product Image
entry.content:
A simple way to delete a product image if the product is permanently deleted.

Copy the code to functions.php or use the “Code Snippets” plugin. Good luck.
